```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(GGally)
library(skimr)

view(diamonds)

names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)

ggpairs(diamonds)

ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
  geom_point()

ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) +
  geom_histogram()



```
